snippet.name: CustomPlugin
snippet.help: Skeleton for a new custom plugin
snippet.starttext:
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------- Author: $${USERNAME} Date: $${DATE} Description: $${Template Description:}
Modifications: $${DATE} - Created template
----------------------------------------------------------------------- INHERITED PROPERTIES: ----------------------------------------------------------------------- instance.pluginName - Name of the plugin instance.pluginVersion - Version of the plugin instance.description - Small description of what the plugin does. instance.pluginPath - OS Path to plugin. variables.sharedLibrary - SharedLibrary cfc instance. ----------------------------------------------------------------------- INHERITED METHODS: ----------------------------------------------------------------------- MUTATOR/ACCESSOR ----------------------------------------------------------------------- string - getPluginName Get the plugin Name void - setPluginName Set the plugin name string - getPluginVersion Get the plugin Version void - setPluginVersion Set the plugin Version string - getPluginDescription Get the plugin Description void - setPluginDescription Set the plugin Description ----------------------------------------------------------------------- FW SPECIFIC ----------------------------------------------------------------------- string - getCurrentLayout() Get the current set Layout. string - getCurrentEvent() Get the current set event string - getCurrentView() Get the current set view string - getResource() Get a resource from the set locale string - getfwLocale() Get the locale of the framework app. datasourceBean - getDatasource() Get a datasource bean Plugin - getMyPlugin() Get a custom plugin. ----------------------------------------------------------------------- FACADES ----------------------------------------------------------------------- void - throw() CFTHROW void - dump() CFDUMP void - abort() CFABORT void - relocate() CFLOCATION void - include() CFINCLUDE -----------------------------------------------------------------------> <cfcomponent name="$${cfc Name:}" hint="$${Hint}" extends="coldbox.system.plugin" output="false">
<!------------------------------------------- CONSTRUCTOR ------------------------------------------->
<cffunction name="init" access="public" returntype="any" output="false"> <cfset super.Init() /> <cfset variables.instance.pluginName = "$${Instance Name:}"> <cfset variables.instance.pluginVersion = "$${Instance Version:}"> <cfset variables.instance.pluginDescription = "$${Instance Description:}"> <cfreturn this> </cffunction>
<!------------------------------------------- PUBLIC ------------------------------------------->
<!------------------------------------------- PRIVATE ------------------------------------------->
</cfcomponent>
